resources.string:
Our quest is to make Green not a niche but the mainstream kind and under the umbrella of “Code Green” “Spire world aims to sensitise the business world towards the economic, environmental and social benefits of adopting Green infrastructure, technologies and practices.” 
 In this modern era every corporate’s agenda quotes ‘Green’. Many practices under corporate responsibility are different shades of green – from using recycled paper to making buildings that follow eco friendly methods. They have set their foundations upon optimal usage of resources and replenishing renewable resources – using to its maximum, that which is abundant in nature and saving resources which are scarce. 
 Spire World’s philosophy of Mainstream Green strives to successfully combine commercial market imperatives and practices with core values regarding environmental sustainability. Eventually it appeals to our sense of responsibility towards both the natural and urban environment. 
 Under the Mainstream Green philosophy, we aim to raise the awareness and form a medium for communication, so that the community is up to speed on how green, productivity and bottom lines are closely interlinked. The intent is to reach out, to connect existing points of entrepreneurship that dot the landscape with ideas and innovation with a green thread.
